website_summaries.verdict: User friendly little affordable safe to keep your valuables and family treasures protected.
pros: Offers a key backup to a traditional dial lock safe
Can hold papers and up to 9-by-12 envelopes comfortably
The bolt-down feature does not void the warranty on flooding
cons: While this safe has a waterproof rating, documents are still recommended to be placed in airtight containers within the safe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy safe! ( I'm not sure my delivery person likes me anymore!) I had this brand a few years ago but in a smaller size. Our house caught on fire and burned to the ground. The safe survived and although we had to break it open because of the heat, documents were saved, although some a little burnt around the top. Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: nancy from oregon

customer_reviews.title: So far I have been able to unlock this safe with 12 different numbers and it is quite easy to do without looking
customer_reviews.text: I have had this safe for sometime but have tested the "security" and have come to the conclusion that I may need to wrap a chain round it and add my own lock. So far I have been able to unlock this safe with 12 different numbers and it is quite easy to do without looking; just by feel. The first number is correct but the middle two have a huge margin of error. The last one is easy to find since everything falls into place when you get there. I will write another review if my house burns down and let you know what happens with the contents.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Won't recommend this product nor will I buy this brand
customer_reviews.text: Lock got stuck, had to force open and now it doesn't lock anymore. Won't recommend this product nor will I buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: MMS

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great safe. Heavier than I expected. The poor UPS guy needed my help to get it out of the truck. This model uses both a combination and circular keys incase you forget the combo. It also comes with floor bolts. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't lock but I fixed it.
customer_reviews.text: I received the Safe and went through the instructions. The mechanism unlocked,but when I tried to close it, the door bolts would not engage. I didn't want to ship it back and go through the return hassle. So, I opened up the back with 4 screws and looked at the locking mechanism. Pretty cheaply built of plastic. I discovered upon assembly it was not properly set so that the bolts would fully deploy. It took 15 minutes to disassemble and put together again with so the bolts would deploy. This safe is more for show than for go but it beats an underwear drawer. So I am happy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A.

customer_reviews.title: Very good home safe
customer_reviews.text: The safe arrived a week early and the packaging was excellent. The safe works perfectly and the bolt down kit makes it easy to secure to the floor. I would definitely recommend this safe, especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was 2" deeper
customer_reviews.text: Seems good quality but while you can put a piece of paper in the buttom it's too shallow to fit an envelop holding that piece of paper. That ended up using much more room that I anticipated but they can stack verticle. Wish it was 2" deeper
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: VERY LOW QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: SAVE YOUR MONEY!! combination lock stopped working not even half a year of sitting untouched in my closet, they offer one month of warranty which is trash , the safe still works with the key but i mean for how much longer lol, one day i bet ill have to cut this thing open because it clearly is self distructing. SAVE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solidly Built, Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very solid construction, surprisingly heavy. Yeah, I know it's a safe, so it's supposed to be... still, when I envisioned a one-square-foot interior, I forgot to factor in the added bulk of the surrounding walls. You could probably drive a car over this thing and only damage the car (although the plastic handle is a surprise). I found the combination lock a bit finicky at first, but it just seemed to take some getting used to. You're NOT allowed to set your own combination! Whatever the safe comes with, that's it's combo for life, so keep those numbers in a safe place.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce P. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality safe for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping and packaging were very good. Mine came directly from Walmart warehouse, so I believe it's cheaper in Walmart. If you need to access the safe as fast as possible, this Mechanical combination is not for you! It takes time to do the 4 actions (left-right-stop ) to open the safe, I prefer to use the key, it's easier and faster. overall it's a good safe and this is my second one from First Alert brand.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and Fire-resistant
customer_reviews.text: The First Alert Waterproof and Fire-resistant Combination Safe has lived up to its billing so far. It is quite sturdy and appears to have the ability to maintain a seal against water and fire. Though I have not had the necessity to test it for the latter, which is a great thing. Superb value for safe guarding your valuables.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Solomon

customer_reviews.title: I searched around after reading some bad reviews of other safes
customer_reviews.text: I searched around after reading some bad reviews of other safes. This thing is a tank, it feels solid, and as far as i can tell, has no backdoors like some other safes. It was shipped well and without damage... It is HEAVY.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Reliable mechanical combination lock
customer_reviews.text: After several failures of Sentry electronic keypad safes, including having to break into one, it's good to have a true mechanical combination safe. This First Alert product is well designed and finished - a cut above competing products I've owned. Unless you are opening & closing the container several times a day, the mechanical combo is the way to go. The double-layer shipping package arrived in perfect condition despite its 90 pound weight.
customer_reviews.author: SG in Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Fire proof safe
customer_reviews.text: The safe box is awesome and it's very big and heavy. The advertisement says it's 88lbs but I believe is more than that and that's a bonus. You can see the quality of the design and the thickness of it that's to protect anything inside from a fire or water. I recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pino San

customer_reviews.title: Much larger and not as secure as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Was not pleased with it it was much larger than I thought and at the back it seem like they had glued some things together that were plastic. Just didn’t seem that it was quality work. It was all so much too large
customer_reviews.author: Monica Wolan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Plus, the service from First Alert was outstanding! The safe arrived early.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Fregger

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. Sturdy, very heavy, no need to bolt down on floor. Inside has more room than expected. Combination works well and key works great. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and well boxed. Unpack near the ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and well boxed. Unpack near the place you want it placed as it is heavy. Set up and in use in 1/2 an hour. Read the description and you get what it describes.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Fireproof , waterproof easy to open  stored several documents easily
customer_reviews.text: I needed to keep several documents safe and fireproof but did not put them in a locked safe. I needed them handy to use but wanted then to be safe Incase of Fire or etc
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: It came damaged and the item is way too heavy to return and lug over to the post office. This seems to be a common issue for buyers based on the other reviews I read. Buy this product elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Good security
customer_reviews.text: First off the size inside was bigger then I thought it would be second what great service from this seller and on a scale of one to ten I would give them a 10, Fast shipping and all question answered. Well built safe probably except a bit of plastic on the inside door and also the self was plastic and not sure how well it would hold up in a fire. Other then that I would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Ray.B

customer_reviews.title: Will ruin all your valuables with moisture and mold
customer_reviews.text: The safe works. But the biggest issue is this thing gets sooo much moisture in it. Ruined countless documents and other valuable items. You have to open up the safe every two weeks for an hour to dry it out. I live in the desert with zero moisture and still it ruined everything with mold. So angry
customer_reviews.author: Burton minor

customer_reviews.title: Really do love the safe very much
customer_reviews.text: Really do love the safe very much, but the combination is almost unbearable to do....You have to have at least 5+ minutes to try and get into it....thank goodness for the key! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Julie in Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Impeccable design
customer_reviews.text: Outstandingly made all around weighs 77 lbs according to printed manufacturing guidelines. Took two guys to haul it in but I tossed it around like weights, ha.
customer_reviews.author: West Coast

customer_reviews.title: NO electronics to fail
customer_reviews.text: just a basic mechanical safe - I love it - no electronics built in to ruin your day Works every time and ALWAYS WILL !
customer_reviews.author: Audio Geek

customer_reviews.title: The safe is fine except for the mildew problem.
customer_reviews.text: This safe is causing items inside to mildew. I’ve put bowls of rice inside which helps very little plus it is difficult to open.
customer_reviews.author: jean stevens

customer_reviews.title: No support!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this safe for my parents. While unpacking, they accidentally threw away the combination and the safe door was shut. I reached out to the seller several times and they could not provide any help on resetting the combination. Brand new safe that is now useless because of no post-purchase support.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: This arrived severely damaged, so I had to return it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy duty safe. Perhaps due to the weight, the shipping company badly damaged it in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: safe
customer_reviews.text: Works great for storing ammo with the hope if the house burns down the don't go off.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R Osterloh

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a breeze, glad to be able to anchor the safe to the floor. Haven't tested any of the other features though, thankfully. I do wish I could set my own code, but not a deal breaker. Much better than a digital lock that when fails leaves you no options but to break into the safe with a crowbar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality safe
customer_reviews.text: Great safe for the money. Very heavy and durable. Bought a second one later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy
customer_reviews.text: Built like a tank.. I like a lot ... except handle seems a little flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S. Queen

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and strong and right size it fits size ...
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and strong and right size it fits size for my small business. I am so happy and save my time .
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Shopped around and this was the best price for the same model- found it at Costco and amazon price was cheaper. No issues so far
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fit 81/2x 11 papers
customer_reviews.text: Used for important papers. Could have been a little bigger to fit 81/2 x11 papers. Be better if it was water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent safe for the money
customer_reviews.text: I just received. It looks very roomy and solidly built. I give it 4 stars only because the lock is a bit tricky to operate and feels cheap. But the door closes tightly and the bolts are of high quality. Excellent safe for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is heavy but that is good so it's not easy to take
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the safe for over six months and haven't had any issues. It is heavy but that is good so it's not easy to take.
customer_reviews.author: James H

customer_reviews.title: Great for waterproof and fireproof
customer_reviews.text: Great for waterproof and fireproof. Heavy, so little chance of bring carried away. I only wish you could change the combo. Once it's compromised, there is no way to change it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great size! Super heavy! Exaclty what we were looking for to store important documents and family momentos.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this safe. Heavy enough that someone isn't just going to walk away with it but light enough to get it in place. Dial seems to be working well and the keys are a nice back-up. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Minimalist

customer_reviews.title: Quality safe
customer_reviews.text: This safe holds more than I initially thought, despite knowing the internal dimensions. Great value for a prime delivery and for arriving with a regular Amazon box that even our curious UPS driver could not determine the contents. This will be a great gift for our boys & their family documents.
customer_reviews.author: MaryL

customer_reviews.title: Solid safe but ours was defective
customer_reviews.text: This is a very safe and when it was delivered I was not able to open the dial spin even with the code they gave , tried several times and had to return it back
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: High quality non electric small safe
customer_reviews.text: Air tight any fumes in ain't getting on period. Good for storing any items that aren't temp sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Edible

customer_reviews.title: If so not want to stack documents get another safe.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice should have had more shelves. Stacking documents is not accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent instruction manual for bolting to floor and really like it.
customer_reviews.author: GMEN

customer_reviews.title: does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this safe. Sturdy and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Matt PG

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s the perfect size for a handgun and paperwork plus more space.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Nybo

customer_reviews.title: UL Listed for Fire - Probably Not Really Burglar Proof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it is UL Listed for fire. I actually put this inside of a larger "fire" rated gun safe for cash and important papers. Very few if any gun safes are actually UL rated against FIRE. Fireboard is not concrete. Now I feel that my cash and important papers are much safer being in a 60 minute UL listed Fire safe inside of a 75 minute manufacturer rated gun safe. This is probably not a secure safe against anyone willing to break it to get in. Of course, it is better than a shoe box especially if bolted down properly.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feel better having it. Downside is having to buy desicant to keep moisture out.
customer_reviews.author: Bartow

customer_reviews.title: I could not have asked for a better safe. Love it and have recommended it to ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I could not have asked for a better safe. Love it and have recommended it to friends and family
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best safe for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great safe for the money. Exactly what I needed. It would be very hard to cart off and hard to break into. The emergency key is round and you have to take off a plate to get to the hole. A round key can't be jimmied! The edges are sealed AND it's fire and waterproof! I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amithist99

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Damaged corner at back. I guess is the delivery issue. Package looks ok from outside. Don’t know how this happened. Good size for putting in the closet
customer_reviews.author: Kuo G.

customer_reviews.title: You may need to adapt it if you want to bolt it down.
customer_reviews.text: You will have to do some serious adapting to bolt it to a thick carpeted closet floor. It will work fine I'm sure. Keeping our wills, estate plans, passports etc. inside possible even a pistol.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Dee S. Gardine

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe
customer_reviews.text: I've used the safe for over a year and have had no trouble with the the safe or combination lock
customer_reviews.author: Hyde County ABC Board

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I fixed it to the ground by the screws provided. It wish it would be heavier
customer_reviews.author: Namer S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Safe
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Could have spent a few more bucks for digital lock mechanism but exactly what I was looking for and easy to install/secure in wood base with the right power tools (hi-power drill(s)-dewalt type). Instructions were easy to follow to secure the safe. It won't walk away I assure you that if installed correctly. Just make sure you know your combination ongoing and store the information and pass keys securely if you need to reference or forget the combo altogether. Roomy inside and enough for my needs. Fire/water proof as long as you install correctly if securing to a structure.
customer_reviews.author: Sound Man from KC

customer_reviews.title: Quality and value, what more could you ask for!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to my friends and family. It's that good and the price is right too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rosenhoch

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secure in my world
customer_reviews.text: His work out perfectly so far there is a few changes I would like to
customer_reviews.author: Russ A Tye

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: This safe came to our door promptly. But it is so heavy you need two people or one strong one. My husband was able to secure it to the floor easily. The safe gets an A+. It is roomy and has a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Simple but function well as described. Have been using it for several months and have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Li Long

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to be able to choose my own combination, other than that, it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tony Manzo

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT I repeat NOT a bolt down safe as advertised. Buyer beware. If you want a bolt down safe this is not the one for you. Get one from Costco or direct from Hayneedle. Really bummed.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Came defective - chipped and no instructions for bolting
customer_reviews.text: Ours came seriously chipped on the corner. It appeared from the description that it could be bolted down. It can't be.
customer_reviews.author: Hoelz

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what we wanted and needed. Well pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Great quality for the price. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mmburchf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great size, can be bolted to the floor, suited our needs
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: A high quality safe that is functional and also looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Andre J. Lukez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for a fraction of the normal cost. Love this item!

customer_reviews.title: Good safe
customer_reviews.text: Good safe if the money well made some plastic parts but for the money you can't beat it

customer_reviews.title: No more sock drawer! Just piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Nice and heavy. No electronics to fail, and pretty spacious!

customer_reviews.title: Sorry for the poor review.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with my purchase and the price that I got it for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: got this on sale which was worth it.
customer_reviews.text: from what I can tell, the material isn't great. but I got this on sale for $100. I'm not sure how secure the bolting down with a single column is. but it takes a lot of stuff - I was able to fit all my camera equipment and things to boot. if you dont want buy a $500 gun safe, might as well go with something cheap and workable like this one.
customer_reviews.author: krusty

customer_reviews.title: I bought two.
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Lock works well. Easy to secure to the floor. Good value for the money. I recommend this safe.

customer_reviews.text: Nice size and has all of the feautures mots people need in a safe. Note that mounting is in the floor (on the bottom) of the safe only.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and large
customer_reviews.text: Nice and large, it is JUST deep enough to fit an 8.5x11 in there (so any file folders / folios / etc don’t fit). It’s nice and sturdy though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: This safe is an awesome value for the money. It's durable and looks great. The quality is great. Not easy to get into which I love. Learn the code and practice opening it. So heavy..you'll need a couple of people to bring inside. Would definitely recommend this product. The shipper and shipping was great as well. Would use this seller again!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Mccrory

customer_reviews.title: The safe choice
customer_reviews.text: Safe arrived as scheduled and was placed in the spot set aside, which was very helpful since it was a gift to my 95 year old father-in-law. It is, as hoped, the right size for papers and small valuables, and the combination was easy for him to dial. Beyond concern for theft, it affords fireproofing and a place to consolidate important information. We are satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sabi

customer_reviews.title: Safe looks well made. However they don't provide enough ...
customer_reviews.text: Safe looks well made. However they don't provide enough protection with their box causing damage. Safe still working and too heavy to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Great product at an awesome price, now the only thing I have to do is go to Lowes or Home Depot and get some heavy duty lugs & bolts to drill & bolt it down to my ceramic tile floor. For those who complain, where else can you buy a fire & water proof safe at such a bargain price and not pay an arm and a leg ? Only at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Flipper

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: Item is just how described. It opens easily, as the combination is not extremely sensitive, like some locks. Luckily, haven't had to put it to the test for water or fire.
customer_reviews.author: J.K.

customer_reviews.title: It came DAMAGED!
customer_reviews.text: The package came damage. I could tell in the first glance that probably the item is damage as well, Sure enough! It was. Not very bad but it was Damage, But not that bad to worth returning. Over all the product is OKAY!
customer_reviews.author: Roy Ghiasvand

customer_reviews.title: Great safe.

customer_reviews.title: We are happy with this safe!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in great condition. Was very happy with the purchase. Still looking for a place in our home to permanently place it, but overall very happy with this item.

customer_reviews.title: Well designed small safe
customer_reviews.text: Small enough to fit in closet, combination large & easy to read. Like the bolt down feature, though I had to find a bolt that was 12mm longer than the one provided as my closet was carpeted & I did not rip out the carpet.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great safe but couldn't get code to unlock so we just use the key

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Small, but does the job. Not very hard to get open though...

customer_reviews.title: Good safe
customer_reviews.text: It's everything it is advertised to be. Hope to never find out if it is fireproof.

customer_reviews.title: decent safe for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed by the all plastic construction, but you get what you pay for. Our last Sentry safe had keypad access. Somehow the circuit board fried and there was no way to get in. So the lack of electronics on this safe is definitely a plus. It stinks that you can't customize the access code on this safe. So if that's an issue, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: C-slice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great! Keeps my important files, sub and money safe.

customer_reviews.title: Home safe
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this safe. Exactly what I wanted Great quality

customer_reviews.title: As advertised- great safe
customer_reviews.text: Great safe at a great price. The reviewers who talk about "plastic-y" are off base. This safe is exceedingly well crafted for its price point, with a fully metal casing, and is very solid with a very sold handle and lock combination.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ustomer

customer_reviews.title: Battle tested war hardened.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been robbed and haven't had a fire. This thing works!

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this safe
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this safe . Easy to fasten down. I like the fact you have a combination or key choice to open it

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open
customer_reviews.text: Easy to open. Self explanatory. Fits perfectly in the space we needed. You can bolt it to the floor if necessary. Hopefully won't ever need to know about the fireretardant properties or the flood protection.
customer_reviews.author: ellen greer

customer_reviews.title: The installation was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.text: The First Alert 2087F-BD 0.94 Cubic Feet Bolt-Down safe is just what I wanted. The installation was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Purkerson

customer_reviews.title: Good safe and well built
customer_reviews.text: Bought the safe to store a gun and was denied the permit good solid safe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total Home security
customer_reviews.text: home delivery of this safe was quick and easy. I felt sorry for the UPS driver though. The safe mounts easily to he wood or concrete floor. A suggestion though, if you're going to mount it on a concrete slab, used a hammer drill to drill the holes. This will save you a lot of work and sweat. Once the amount is in place, the safe is mounted on top of it and truly preserves the waterproof and fireproof features of the safe. I'm totally happy with my purchase. Now I can do away with my bank safety deposit box, which will pay for the safe in about 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: A. Langa

customer_reviews.title: great safe
customer_reviews.text: This safe came in 3 days earlier then the expected delivery date. It is very heavy and sturdy. The inside has some organizational pockets in the door and a two shelf layout inside. Its perfect for on the floor or up ontop of a shelf in a closet. I got it for my important documents and some of my smaller guns.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works better than expected. I wish I could choose my own combination though.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

product_meta.title: First Alert 2087F Waterproof and Fire-Resistant Bolt-Down Combination Safe, 0.94 Cubic Feet
product_meta.description:
Safeguard your valuables against theft, water, and fire with the First Alert 2087F BD Waterproof and Fire Resistant Bolt Down Combination Safe. Featuring a capacity of 0.94 cubic feet, this waterproof safe offers enough space to store money, documents, jewelry, and other precious belongings. It has also been verified by an independent testing lab to protect electronic media, including memory sticks, CDs, DVDs, and external hard drives. This fire resistant safe can withstand external temperatures of up to 1700 degrees Fahrenheit for up to one hour while maintaining an internal temperature of less than 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Equipped with pry proof concealed hinges, it resists forcible break in attempts and remains completely waterproof even when fully submerged. Exclusive bolt down technology allows you to fasten the safe to a surface for additional disaster proofing, while four live locking door bolts keep the door firmly secured. This Ready Seal safe remains waterproof and fire resistant even when bolted to the floor and can be bolted without voiding the warranty. The safe also comes with two emergency override keys that ensure you do not lose access to your items even if you forget the passcode. And thanks to its adjustable storage shelf, key rack, and door pocket, the safe makes it easy to organize your valuables.

AMAZON.COM


Safe for keeping valuables protected from fires, floods, and thieves. view larger Protect your valuables from fires, floods, and thieves using the 2087F-BD waterproof one-hour Ready-Seal fire safe from First Alert. Part of the company's line of waterproof fire safes, the 2087F-BD is built to withstand fires up to 1,700 degrees F for one hour and features a waterproof seal to keep out moisture. Combination lock and concealed, pry-resistant hinges offer added security. 

EXCEPTIONALLY RESISTANT TO FIRES
Designed to keep your documents and other valuables safe in the event of a fire, the 2087F-BD waterproof one-hour fire safe has been classified by Underwriters Laboratories (UL) to withstand external temperatures of 1,700 degrees F for one hour while maintaining an internal temperature of less than 350 degrees F.

WATERPROOF SEAL TO KEEP OUT MOISTURE
The safe comes equipped with a waterproof seal along the opening that keeps your valuables dry--even when the chest is fully submerged. This is great for protecting your documents if there's a fire and emergency sprinklers are triggered. The seal also enables the safe to float during a flood, keeping it up out of the water and making it easy to locate.

The Ready-Seal safe can be bolted to the floor and remain waterproof and fire-resistant with the warranty completely intact.

STORE ELECTRONIC MEDIA AND OTHER VALUABLES
Along with important documents, you can use the 2087F-BD to safeguard computer discs, USB flash drives, and other data storage devices. The safe has been independently verified to protect electronic media such as memory drives, CDs, DVDs, and external hard drives in a fire.

COMBINATION LOCK WITH EMERGENCY OVERRIDE KEY
The 2087F-BD comes equipped with a four-digit combination lock made to be used in conjunction with an entry key for added security. The entry key operates the safe's live bolts after you've entered the combination. You can leave the key in the keyhole and use only the combination lock to secure the door, or you can remove the key for extra protection. An emergency override key enables you to open the safe even without entering the combination--ensuring that you retain access to your valuables.

RESIN CONSTRUCTION AND PRY-RESISTANT HINGES
Made of durable resin, this safe sports four solid-steel locking door bolts and patented, concealed, pry-resistant Delta hinges to deter thieves. An adjustable, removable shelf allows you to maximize the space inside the safe, while the hanging key rack and door pocket make it easy to organize your belongings. 

PRODUCT INFORMATION
The 2087F-BD measures 16.50 by 14.50 by 19.00 inches (H x W x D) and weighs 82 pounds. On the inside, it measures 12.88 by 10.38 by 12.25 inches and has a capacity of 0.94 cubic feet. The safe's compact size allows you to store it neatly in a closet or home office.

ABOUT FIRST ALERT
First Alert is the most recognized and trusted brand in home safety and security products, helping protect what matters most to you and your family. The company is a leading manufacturer of smoke alarms, carbon monoxide detectors, fire extinguishing products, safes, security cameras, fencing, doors, window guards, and many other home safety products.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
One 2087F-BD waterproof one-hour fire safe with combination lock, one adjustable/removable shelf, one key rack, one door pocket, two override keys, Ready-Seal mounting hardware, and one manual.
